name: Maps & Geocoding
description: Google Maps integration for address geocoding, church location display, and family mapping. Manages Google Maps API credentials and church geo-coordinates.
author: ChurchCRM Team

settings.label: Google Maps API Key
settings.help: Google Maps API Key used for server-side address geocoding. Get yours at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

settings.label: Church Latitude
settings.help: Latitude of the church, used to center the map. Auto-populated when a valid API key is configured.

settings.label: Church Longitude
settings.help: Longitude of the church, used to center the map. Auto-populated when a valid API key is configured.

settings.label: Hide Lat/Lon Fields
settings.help: Hide the Latitude and Longitude input fields in the Family Editor. Address lookups are still performed when enabled.
